page.title: 08INDUSTRY IN HYLTON
page.content: Historically the main industries in South Hylton were shipbuilding, pottery and the coal trade. All of these are now finished and employment in the area is concentrated on purpose built industrial estates. At Pennywell there are 7 companies which employ a total of 1587 workers Echo-newspapers;Bard-pharmaceuticals; Scotkem-chemicals;Dunlop-piping;Ideal Windows;Power Steering-car steering; Dewhirst-clothing. There are also factory and workshop sites at Pattinson North and South in Washington which employ over 400 people in service industries such as car valeting and in secondary industries such as food, clothing, fire safety and signs. Despite these estates there is a shortage of jobs in the area.
